author: Bhaanaaa
text:
WOW shampoo and ye Mama Earth ka Onion Shampoo.
Dono ki chiknahat nikalti hi nai hai! The Shampoo and the minimal lather it forms stays on your scalp and hair and just don't wash away! You have to wash your hair with another GOOD shampoo in order to do so!

author: Bhaanaaa
text: Humans, beware of humans https://t.co/2Mixf6rytW

author: Bhaanaaa
text:
The Babri Masjid scene continues and in the last hundred pages of the book Astha and Piplika meet.
It is very difficult to read the book, the interest hardly builds up especially after watching the show which was written far better than the book it is based on.

author: Bhaanaaa
text:
The show is far better than the book.
As for the book, the book is of 300 pages, ten pages more or less and for the first hundred pages it is all about Astha and Hemant and then they introduce Piplika... Then for next hundred pages it is all about the Babri Masjid and Aijaz

author: Bhaanaaa
text:
Books have been better than the show or the movie for me but in this case.
I must say that Ekta Kapoor and the writers did a great job with the show and for all the changes and the characters they introduced. Oh! Especially the humor, the cinematography. https://t.co/l3OLTQLxgv

author: Bhaanaaa
text:
I got three different flavors from the Bangladeshi noodles, Mr Noodles. But only tried 2
They are bland in taste
As soon as you open the pack you smell of something synthetic...which is a turn off
They take time to cook and they are slightly harder than the usual noodles we have https://t.co/nROFyhZjzO

author: Bhaanaaa
text:
Top Ramen tastes fine overall.
The Atta flavor is similar to the Maggi Atta noodles, of course this one doesn't contain real Atta as well.
Fiery chilli actually tastes like chilly, not too much but yes you do realise you're eating chilly flavored noodles. https://t.co/52AtXoWApJ

author: Bhaanaaa
text:
Four years into medicine and there is just one medication that I know (Acetaminophen), 
One adverse effect I know (diarrhoea), 
And just one symptom which I am familiar with (fever)
For the rest of it, I am and I've always been - clueless
#Meredumbneuronskheleankhmacholi

author: Bhaanaaa
text:
I love Maggi 💛
Veg Atta doesn't contain Atta and Masala Oats doesn't contain Oats.
Taste of both these flavours is almost similar, hard to differentiate.
If you don't like veggies in your Maggi, you won't like it.
The texture of noodles is a bit fiber like.
Good in taste! ❤️ https://t.co/ty6x6GahTN
